Technique: FORMED ON THE POTTER'S WHEEL; ENGOBE; PAINTED
Name: Globular bottle
Description: Globular bottle, with narrow mouth, straight and rounded rim, bottleneck with straight walls and unstable convex base. The paste is of a reddish colour and the surface bears remnants of a coating of the same colour. The middle part of the body presents a painted decoration consisting of bands in the colours red and wine-red, encircling the piece.
